# The `HotColdSplitting.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The goal of hot/cold splitting is to improve the memory locality of code. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

The goal of hot/cold splitting is to improve the memory locality of code.

The splitting pass does this by identifying cold blocks and moving them into separate functions.

When the splitting pass finds a cold block (referred to as &quot;the sink&quot;), it grows a maximal cold region around that block. The maximal region contains all blocks (post-)dominated by the sink &#91;&#42;&#93;. In theory, these blocks are as cold as the sink. Once a region is found, it&#39;s split out of the original function provided it&#39;s profitable to do so.

&#91;&#42;&#93; In practice, there is some added complexity because some blocks are not safe to extract.

TODO: <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> the PM to get domtrees, and preserve BFI/BPI. TODO: Reorder outlined functions.

<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Same as blockEndsInUnreachable in CodeGen/BranchFolding.cpp. Do not modify</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this function unless you modify the MBB version as well.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A no successor, non-return block probably ends in unreachable and is cold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Also consider a block that ends in an indirect branch to be a return block,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// since many targets use plain indirect branches to return.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#a4683663d1041570f374ad7ac4ea119eb"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#a4683663d1041570f374ad7ac4ea119eb">blockEndsInUnreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a126a78caf2176eb39d879c899bdd749c">succ&#95;empty</a>(&amp;BB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a266367eb01c634406b32f816d2d9c6bf">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = BB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ReturnInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;IndirectBrInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#aa5755510005963e0d33f000914c5489d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#aa5755510005963e0d33f000914c5489d">analyzeProfMetadata</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Handle branches with &gt; 2 successors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;CondBr = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CondBr)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t TrueWt, FalseWt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac19cbbc4935a23e1d44f65e1eaba6b1d">extractBranchWeights</a>(&#42;CondBr, TrueWt, FalseWt))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SumWt = TrueWt + FalseWt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SumWt == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TrueProb = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746">BranchProbability::getBranchProbability</a>(TrueWt, SumWt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FalseProb = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746">BranchProbability::getBranchProbability</a>(FalseWt, SumWt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TrueProb &lt;= ColdProbThresh)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AnnotatedColdBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(CondBr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Count the number of phis in exit blocks with &gt;= 2 incoming values from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outlining region. These phis are split (\\ref severSplitPHINodesOfExits),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and new outputs are created to supply the split phis. CodeExtractor can&#39;t</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumSplitExitPhis = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitBB : SuccsOutsideRegion) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find all incoming values from the outlining region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumIncomingVals = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; PN.getNumIncomingValues(); ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd1cd968cb420c82d70926920fcdc7d7">llvm::is&#95;contained</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a>, PN.getIncomingBlock(i))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ++NumIncomingVals;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">            ++NumSplitExitPhis;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Apply a penalty for calling the split function. Factor in the cost of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// materializing all of the parameters.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumOutputsAndSplitPhis = NumOutputs + NumSplitExitPhis;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumParams = NumInputs + NumOutputsAndSplitPhis;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumParams &gt; <a href="#a60a587bdd425f8af92ae933813303e9f">MaxParametersForSplit</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; NumInputs &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; inputs and &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; NumOutputsAndSplitPhis</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Apply the typical code size cost for an output alloca and its associated</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">           &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ore/#a5ca06dfbc998afac005414d8e9b7c234">ore::NV</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Block&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &amp;EntryPoint);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A pair of (basic block, score).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456" lineLink="#a0134180716271c522b7b0e1537ce7d9b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#a0134180716271c522b7b0e1537ce7d9b">BlockTy</a> = std::pair&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, unsigned&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A maximal outlining region. This contains all blocks post-dominated by a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// sink block, the sink block itself, and all blocks dominated by the sink.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If sink-predecessors and sink-successors cannot be extracted in one region,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the static constructor returns a list of suitable extraction regions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">OutliningRegion &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A list of (block, score) pairs. A block&#39;s score is non-zero iff it&#39;s a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// viable sub-region entry point. Blocks with higher scores are better entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// points (i.e. they are more distant ancestors of the sink block).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BlockTy, 0&gt;</a> Blocks = &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The suggested entry point into the region. If the region has multiple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// entry points, all blocks within the region may not be reachable from this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// entry point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;SuggestedEntryPoint = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Whether the entire function is cold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EntireFunctionCold = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If \\p BB is a viable entry point, return \\p Score. Return 0 otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> getEntryPointScore(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;BB, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Score) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#aef2714d7816ffbf7f4eebf159be19d1f">mayExtractBlock</a>(BB) ? Score : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// These scores should be lower than the score for predecessor blocks,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// because regions starting at predecessor blocks are typically larger.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScoreForSuccBlock = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScoreForSinkBlock = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OutliningRegion(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OutliningRegion &amp;) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OutliningRegion &amp;operator=(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OutliningRegion &amp;) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#afb4320cb58bc4cbe61cd1e3c8e7f73f3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#afb4320cb58bc4cbe61cd1e3c8e7f73f3">OutliningRegion</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#a3f35d35f99dde67eaebf75393bee5275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#a3f35d35f99dde67eaebf75393bee5275">OutliningRegion</a>(OutliningRegion &amp;&amp;) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#add67f7f4d83727202d564d298c9e13ac"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OutliningRegion &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#add67f7f4d83727202d564d298c9e13ac">operator=</a>(OutliningRegion &amp;&amp;) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#aead9a4f05ccb13941f28611766176f30"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;OutliningRegion&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#aead9a4f05ccb13941f28611766176f30">create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;SinkBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/postdominatortree">PostDominatorTree</a> &amp;PDT) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;OutliningRegion&gt; Regions;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> RegionBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Regions.emplace&#95;back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OutliningRegion &#42;ColdRegion = &amp;Regions.back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> addBlockToRegion = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Score) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RegionBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ColdRegion-&gt;Blocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a396fcfee6914c76974b73c3d203da6a5">emplace&#95;back</a>(BB, Score);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The ancestor farthest-away from SinkBB, and also post-dominated by it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SinkScore = getEntryPointScore(SinkBB, ScoreForSinkBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ColdRegion-&gt;SuggestedEntryPoint = (SinkScore &gt; 0) ? &amp;SinkBB : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BestScore = SinkScore;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Visit SinkBB&#39;s ancestors using inverse DFS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PredIt = ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abe62b2144b4f06c41efe3c775316f282">idf&#95;begin</a>(&amp;SinkBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PredEnd = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8ea0b29d9cab61cc46291acf44187279">idf&#95;end</a>(&amp;SinkBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PredIt != PredEnd) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;PredBB = &#42;&#42;PredIt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SinkPostDom = PDT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/postdominatortree/#ac74ec035b8eeaeb39cfea312fa876c75">dominates</a>(&amp;SinkBB, &amp;PredBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the predecessor is cold and has no predecessors, the entire</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function must be cold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SinkPostDom &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad66c4759666aab78529658362b498c74">pred&#95;empty</a>(&amp;PredBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ColdRegion-&gt;EntireFunctionCold = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Regions;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If SinkBB does not post-dominate a predecessor, do not mark the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predecessor (or any of its predecessors) cold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SinkPostDom || !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#aef2714d7816ffbf7f4eebf159be19d1f">mayExtractBlock</a>(PredBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PredIt.skipChildren();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of the post-dominated ancestor farthest away from the sink.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The path length is always &gt;= 2, ensuring that predecessor blocks are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// considered as entry points before the sink block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PredScore = getEntryPointScore(PredBB, PredIt.getPathLength());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PredScore &gt; BestScore) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ColdRegion-&gt;SuggestedEntryPoint = &amp;PredBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BestScore = PredScore;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">      addBlockToRegion(&amp;PredBB, PredScore);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++PredIt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the sink can be added to the cold region, do so. It&#39;s considered as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an entry point before any sink-successor blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, split cold sink-successor blocks using a separate region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This satisfies the requirement that all extraction blocks other than the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// first have predecessors within the extraction region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#aef2714d7816ffbf7f4eebf159be19d1f">mayExtractBlock</a>(SinkBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">      addBlockToRegion(&amp;SinkBB, SinkScore);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad66c4759666aab78529658362b498c74">pred&#95;empty</a>(&amp;SinkBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ColdRegion-&gt;EntireFunctionCold = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Regions;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Regions.emplace&#95;back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ColdRegion = &amp;Regions.back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BestScore = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find all successors of SinkBB dominated by SinkBB using DFS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SuccIt = ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3a4c46542f8881cacd05836ba00ab8ec">df&#95;begin</a>(&amp;SinkBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SuccEnd = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad6c4441c599522e0d10c1391a460c275">df&#95;end</a>(&amp;SinkBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SuccIt != SuccEnd) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;SuccBB = &#42;&#42;SuccIt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SinkDom = DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a5c69311e8d44898dac36a155c3d8691d">dominates</a>(&amp;SinkBB, &amp;SuccBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t allow the backwards &amp; forwards DFSes to mark the same block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DuplicateBlock = RegionBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(&amp;SuccBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If SinkBB does not dominate a successor, do not mark the successor (or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// any of its successors) cold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DuplicateBlock || !SinkDom || !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#aef2714d7816ffbf7f4eebf159be19d1f">mayExtractBlock</a>(SuccBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SuccIt.skipChildren();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SuccScore = getEntryPointScore(SuccBB, ScoreForSuccBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SuccScore &gt; BestScore) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">      addBlockToRegion(&amp;SuccBB, SuccScore);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++SuccIt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// During the removal, identify the next best entry point into the region.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegionStartIt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ec2517b6489e71067be03afebb4d350">remove&#95;if</a>(Blocks, &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a0134180716271c522b7b0e1537ce7d9b">BlockTy</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.first;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!InSubRegion &amp;&amp; Score &gt; NextScore) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Blocks.erase(RegionStartIt, RegionEndIt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"></CodeLine>
